name: Sphoxie
description: In Sphoxie you must help our little spikey blue spherical dude get back home after a portal sucked him to a strange cube world. Many dangers and obstacles await, can you handle it?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 680 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 680 MB available space
